Nature of Potential.quote: Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect. (Matthew 5:48)

Awakening.quote: The kingdom of heaven is within you. (Luke 17:21)

Inner Divinity.quote: Aham Brahmasmi - I am Brahman. (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 1.4.10)

Spiritual Evolution.quote: The goal of evolution is self-realization in the Divine. (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Divine Spark.quote: The light of the divine dwells within the heart of all beings. (Bhagavad Gita 15:15)

Sacred Development.quote: Until Christ is formed in you. (Galatians 4:19)

Transformation.quote: Be transformed by the renewing of your mind. (Romans 12:2)

Higher Self.quote: Know thyself and thou shalt know the universe and God. (Ancient Egyptian Proverb)

Divine Union.quote: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee. (John 17:21)

Spiritual Growth.quote: The path of the righteous is like the morning sun, shining ever brighter till the full light of day. (Proverbs 4:18)

Soul Evolution.quote: The soul moves from darkness to light, from death to immortality. (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 1.3.28)

Divine Qualities.quote: By divine qualities one attains liberation. (Bhagavad Gita 16:5)

Sacred Journey.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 64)

Spiritual Alchemy.quote: Transform the base metal of self into the gold of spirit. (Rumi)

Divine Inheritance.quote: We are heirs of God and co-heirs with Christ. (Romans 8:17)

Sacred Purpose.quote: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you. (Jeremiah 1:5)

Divine Essence.quote: Your true nature is pure awareness. (Yoga Sutras 1.3)

Spiritual Capacity.quote: Greater things than these shall you do. (John 14:12)

Divine Reflection.quote: We all reflect the Lord's glory and are being transformed into his image. (2 Corinthians 3:18)

Sacred Power.quote: The kingdom of God comes not with observation but with power. (Luke 17:20)

Inner Light.quote: Let your light shine before others. (Matthew 5:16)

Divine Seeds.quote: The seed of divinity lies dormant in every soul. (Meister Eckhart)

Spiritual Unfoldment.quote: Like a lotus flower that grows out of the mud and blossoms above the water. (Buddhist Teaching)

Divine Becoming.quote: What we are is God's gift to us. What we become is our gift to God. (Eleanor Powell)

Sacred Evolution.quote: Evolution is God's way of creating. (Pierre Teilhard de Chardin)

Divine Integration.quote: As above, so below; as within, so without. (Hermes Trismegistus)

Spiritual Activation.quote: Awake, O sleeper, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you. (Ephesians 5:14)

Divine Expression.quote: Let that mind be in you which was also in Christ Jesus. (Philippians 2:5)

Sacred Destiny.quote: You are gods, children of the Most High. (Psalm 82:6)

Divine Completion.quote: Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect. (Matthew 5:48)
